short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A web extension for automation of Kron Http-Proxy authentication

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension facilitates users of the PAM solution to successfully complete the secure authentication phase. It works cooperatively with the login system of the Kron Http-Proxy application and minimizes user interaction by automating authentication.
